sentence.Network_en: Starting emptyhanded he had accumulated vast farmlands, built houses, raised this large family.
sentence.Network_cn: 他想:他从前怎样苦学出身,得到功名,做了多年的官,造就了这一份大家业,广置了田产, 修建了房屋, 又生了这些儿女和这许多孙儿、女和重孙.

entry.tran: 两手空空的;一无所获的
entry.def: If you come away from somewhere empty-handed, you have failed to get what you wanted.

example.ex: Delegates from the warring sides held a new round of peace talks but went away empty-handed...
example.tran: 交战各方的代表进行了新一轮的和谈，但是毫无成果。

example.ex: Shirley returned home empty-handed from her shopping trip.
example.tran: 雪莉出去购物，回家时却两手空空。
